text: Bozgasti hamai sumo ʙa sui Ust. In ʙa jaqin va'dai Alloh ast. Ust ofarinisi maxluqotro oƣoz mekunad, sipas onro ʙa hajati avval ʙozgardonad, to kasonero, ki imon ovarda va kori soista kardaand, az rui adl mukofot dihad. Va kofironro ʙa cazoi kufrason saroʙest az oʙi cuson, ki ruj va me'dahoro pora-pora mekunad va azoʙi dardovarest ʙa saʙaʙi kufrason
